privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: At SplitSmart, we value and respect your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.dataCollectionText:
‚Ä¢ Profile information (name, email, phone)
‚Ä¢ Event and expense data you enter
‚Ä¢ Application usage information
‚Ä¢ Technical device data (model, operating system)
privacy.dataUseText:
‚Ä¢ Provide and improve our services
‚Ä¢ Process expense and balance calculations
‚Ä¢ Send relevant notifications
‚Ä¢ Provide technical support
‚Ä¢ Develop new features
privacy.dataStorageText: All your data is stored locally on your mobile device. We do not send or store personal information on external servers. You have complete control over your data.
privacy.dataSharingText: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties. Data is only shared when you explicitly share event information with other users.
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement security measures to protect your information. However, no storage method is 100% secure. We recommend keeping your device secure.
privacy.userRightsText:
‚Ä¢ Access: You can view all your data at any time
‚Ä¢ Modification: You can edit your information
‚Ä¢ Deletion: You can delete your account and all data
‚Ä¢ Portability: You can export your data
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us through the "Contact Support" section.
